about_the_game:
A Merchant's Promise features No Inventory & Physics-based Simulation gameplay.

Starting as a lowly Merchant you can eventually earn your way to a King's Merchant through trading as you experience loss, weather, and some light survival elements such as hunger, thirst, health, and stamina.

This game is meant to be unique and difficult. Permanent Death is the desired play through mode.

The Demo is a sandbox-like way to get used to handling items if you wish to try that first! (Demo will undergo a large update prior to Steam Next Fest Feb 2025.

This game receives regular updates and is worked on Full Time (+)

Priorities of Continued EA Development:

  • The Game World - Barren and Empty is the last thing I want to have. This is a temporary state as I ensure a Solid Foundation of current gameplay mechanics before just adding more and more.

  • NPCs - I assure you...they cause me pain to watch as well! They will be improved.

  • Consistent & Reliable gameplay - Physics games are quirky and a lot of adjustments are always being made

  • Performance - No one wants a 47GB game download that gets 12FPS

  • Gets the bugs out - As a dude in his garage learning every day, I try my best to handle these through the Discord Reporting (Link on Store Page) as soon as possible

Thank you for taking the time to visit and I look forward to providing you with a great product and fun challenge!
